dreisoft.tresos.guidedconfig.api.backend
Class AbstractDCtxtBackend

java.lang.Object
  dreisoft.tresos.lib2.platform.AbstractExecutableExtension
      dreisoft.tresos.guidedconfig.api.backend.AbstractBackend
          dreisoft.tresos.guidedconfig.api.backend.AbstractDCtxtBackend
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.eclipse.core.runtime.IExecutableExtension
Deprecated. 

@Deprecated
public abstract class AbstractDCtxtBackend
extends AbstractBackend

Extends the AbstractBackend by methods which mark certain DCtxts as changed. This might be used to show the result to the user (e.g. within an ChangedDCtxtsResultWidget.

Copyright (C) Elektrobit Automotive GmbH - All rights reserved

This class is marked as deprecated. It is now possible to use the ChangedDCtxtsResultWidget for each implementation of an AbstractBackend. It is not necessary anymore to collect all changed DCtxts on your own, this is now done by the backend and shown in the ChangedDCtxtsResultWidget.

Since:
2010.a

addChangedDCtxt

public void addChangedDCtxt(DCtxt parameter)
Deprecated. 
Marks the given DCtxt as changed by this backend run and stores the current value of this DCtxt. So if another (autoconfiguration) wizard changes the same DCtxt, the value set by this backend is stored for displaying the results in the result view.

Since:
2010.a

addChangedDCtxt

public void addChangedDCtxt(java.util.List<DCtxt> parameters)
Deprecated. 
Marks the given DCtxt as changed by this backend run and stores the current value of this DCtxt. So if another (autoconfiguration) wizard changes the same DCtxt, the value set by this backend is stored for displaying the results in the result view.

Since:
2010.a
